title: Single-nucleus RNA and multiomics in situ pairwise sequencing reveals cellular heterogeneity of the abnormal ligamentum teres in patients with developmental dysplasia of the hip
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Zhenhui Zhao, Chuiqin Fan, Shiyou Wang, Haoyu Wang, Hansheng Deng, Shuaidan Zeng, Shengping Tang, Li Li, Zhu Xiong, Xin Qiu
